scripts.dev: npm run build -w @finapp/shared && concurrently -n server,client -c cyan,magenta "npm run dev -w @finapp/server" "npm run dev -w @finapp/client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @finapp/shared && npm run build -w @finapp/server && npm run build -w @finapp/client
scripts.test: npm run test -w @finapp/shared && npm run test -w @finapp/server && npm run test -w @finapp/client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w @finapp/shared && npm run typecheck -w @finapp/server && npm run typecheck -w @finapp/client
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w @finapp/shared && npm run lint -w @finapp/server && npm run lint -w @finapp/client
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w @finapp/shared && npm run lint:fix -w @finapp/server && npm run lint:fix -w @finapp/client
